existing_features.title: Expose the new backend admin profile-listing query through the frontend typed actor and add a React Query hook to fetch it (following the patterns used in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts).
Add an admin UI view that displays all saved user profiles to authenticated admins in the Admin Dashboard, including a searchable list and a detail view for a selected profile.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an admin view to list and access all saved user profiles
Add a backend admin-only query that returns a list of all saved user profiles, including each profileâ€™s owning Principal and the stored UserProfile fields.

projectName: Admin view to list all saved user profiles
